feature.name: Match Score Tooltip Improvements
feature.description: Enhanced the match score tooltip in the tools section to make it easier to interact with by expanding the clickable area to include the entire 'N/A ? Match Score' label
feature.issue: The tooltip was difficult to select because only the 'N/A ?' part was clickable, not the 'Match Score' text
feature.solution: Added an includeLabel prop to MatchScoreTooltip component that wraps the entire area including 'Match Score' text in the tooltip trigger

changes.description: Added includeLabel prop to optionally include 'Match Score' text in the clickable tooltip trigger area
changes_detail: Added includeLabel?: boolean prop to interface (defaults to false for backwards compatibility)
Modified trigger div to conditionally render 'Match Score' text when includeLabel=true
Added active:bg-gray-200 class for better touch feedback on mobile devices
Maintained existing hover functionality via MobileTooltip which already supports desktop hover

changes.description: Updated to use the new includeLabel prop, making entire match score area clickable
changes_detail: Removed duplicate 'Match Score' span that was previously outside the tooltip wrapper
Result: entire 'N/A ? Match Score' badge is now clickable for tooltip interaction

benefits.description: Entire 'N/A ? Match Score' area is now clickable, making it easier to tap on mobile and touchscreen devices
MobileTooltip component already provides automatic hover functionality on desktop via BasicHoverTooltip, so desktop users can now hover over the entire match score area
The clickable area now visually matches what users expect to be interactive (the entire badge)
The includeLabel prop defaults to false, so any other uses of MatchScoreTooltip remain unchanged
Works consistently across mobile phones, touchscreen laptops, and desktop computers

testing_notes.mobile: Tap anywhere on the 'N/A ? Match Score' badge to see the tooltip
testing_notes.touchscreen_laptop: Tap or hover over the 'N/A ? Match Score' badge to see the tooltip
testing_notes.desktop: Hover over the 'N/A ? Match Score' badge to see the tooltip appear automatically
testing_notes.keyboard: Tab to focus on the badge and it should show the tooltip (via MobileTooltip's focus handlers)

tooltip_behavior.mobile_phones_tablets: Click to toggle tooltip, auto-closes after 4 seconds or when clicking outside
tooltip_behavior.touchscreen_laptops: Hybrid mode - hover shows tooltip, click toggles it for touch interactions
tooltip_behavior.desktop: Hover shows tooltip automatically with no click required

locations_affected: Tools section - when criteria have not been adjusted (N/A state)
locations_not_affected: Recommendations section - always shows actual scores (8/10, 6/10, etc.), never N/A
